website_summaries.verdict: A slim-fitting money belt with RFID protection integrated into the fabric. Just remember to take it easy on the zippers.
pros: Built-in RFID protection means any pocket is safe
Easy to organize, with pockets and hidden inner compartments
Dual side-release buckle prevents accidental unbuckling
Slim-fitting belt made of durable 210D ripstop nylon with mesh backing
Comes in a variety of sizes and colors
cons: Several reports of zippers breaking, snagging, or fraying

customer_reviews.title: Money belt was great for my trip to Italy
customer_reviews.text: I used this money belt on a recent trip to Italy and it met all of my needs as it had enough space to hold two passports, a couple of credit cards and cash. The belt was very slim so it didn't show through my clothing, it was comfortable and the elastic band retained its elasticity. I would definitely recommend this money below. One last comment - I wrapped the elastic band around one of my belt loops so that even if somebody had been able to disconnect the belt's latch the belt would not have been able to be removed as I would have felt it being pulled upon.
customer_reviews.author: Bizyguy

customer_reviews.title: Won't travel without it again
customer_reviews.text: We just finished an around the world trip. This money belt went through 18 airports, probably 25 security checks. It never set off an alarm. After 6 weeks and 40,000 miles, it looks as good as it did when we started our trip. I had one and my fiance had one. I used mine as my jeans belt with longish t-shirts so it couldn't be seen. My fiance had his under all his clothing. I kept only money in mine. He kept passport, money and credit cards in his. We'd take them off and put them right into the safe in our hotel room. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Ripped easily
customer_reviews.text: I zipped/unzipped the top compartment maybe 7 times and the fabric above the zipper started to tear, making it nearly impossible to open/close the top zipper. My husband bought a different brand of money belt (Alpha Keeper) and opened his probably 5 times per day for 13 days (he was carrying the majority of the money for our vacation) and didn't have this problem. Also, the top compartment is BARELY large enough to fit a US passport so getting the passport in the top compartment and fitting the fabric over the passport so you can close the compartment was challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Webb

customer_reviews.title: Terribly disappointed. Broke on morning of 2nd day.
customer_reviews.text: Terribly disappointed and got lucky. Traveling and on the second day, I felt something shift at my back. Luckily it didn’t fall out when I got onto a bus. I was holding my money and my elderly mother. Wasn’t a lot of money, but every bit of foreign currency matters. It was even Amazon Recommended. Not happy! 1 days use!
customer_reviews.author: D. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt, but frayed
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fabric and small zipper tabs on this money belt--also the fabric slots to fit them in to. Discreet! Sadly a seam came apart after 5 minutes on the first trial wear before our European trip, so am returning.
customer_reviews.author: KLC

customer_reviews.title: did not fit my passport (standard size), and the ...
customer_reviews.text: did not fit my passport (standard size), and the standard DL entry papers had to be folded to fit inside. Impractical and not worth the money. It actually made things HARDER at the airport rather than easier. I will use a standard fanny pack instead. Returned the item after the first plane flight.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Elastic Waist Belt
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three money belts for use on a 2 week family vacation to Europe. Adjusted the waist belt to fit loosely to allow access. After about 4 days of use the elastic started to fray and come apart. Very disappointed in the build quality of the waist belt. I feel a non elastic piece sewn to the money belt may have eliminated issues. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Elastic band is pure elastic
customer_reviews.text: The band is pure elastic so it will very potentially lose its elastcitiy if you wear it often, leading to a fit that isnt snug or tight if you are smaller sized
customer_reviews.author: Andy LNU

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this money belt to use on our Italian bus tour. Wore it three time when it unexpectedly broke. Luckily I noticed or I would have lost my passport, my Euros, my drivers license, and my credit cards. Do not buy if you don’t want to lose you valuables. It’s to late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Defective Zipper..
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive the money belt due to the 5-stars review. However, once I opened the package, the zipper was already broken. I was very disappointed at the quality of the item. I had purchased two of the belts (one regular size and one extra-small size). Decided to return both due to the defect of the first one. However, the sizing is true to size and the extra-small fit perfectly around my petite waist. That was the only good thing about the money belt. Otherwise, very disappointed in the zipper quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made, Broke Almost Immediately
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for less than two days before the zipper broke in the inside and now it barely closes. I made sure to take good care of this product and not overfill it, however it broke with barely anything inside. I would have written a bad review the day I began using it, but I have been traveling with this faulty product (unfortunately). I have to carry my things now because this product is completely broken.
customer_reviews.author: Donita J.

customer_reviews.title: Not at all a good product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for a trip to Spain. We used them for a week and it started to unravel on the belt part and the zipper got stuck so we had to cut it open to get our money and cards out. Trying to return it but there isn’t a return available. Don’t buy this not worth anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a week of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and both had to be returned after a week. Used it to hold a passport and some cash. By the 5th day the inside was tearing. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Wisget

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but won’t last a week
customer_reviews.text: At first this belt was seamlessly perfect. Fit well under clothes, had the right amount of pockets. It was a great buy! A little big for my waist but it was probably cause Im just small. But less than a week into my two week trip in Europe the front pocket was ripped & it continued to do so until the entire side of the pocket was ripped & money began falling out. Without much stress on the money belt itself, it’s nearly unusable. I made it work but was disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Arrived today/Returning today
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today. Zipper pull is missing on one zipper, and the other zipper doesn’t work. Not impressed!
customer_reviews.author: D.Miller

customer_reviews.title: Two weeks showing signs of wear.
customer_reviews.text: This held up well for two weeks but then it started to show signs of wear where the straps anchor. I might of had it too tight and I might take it for another two week run after I sew the strap for a piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: SmokingChicken

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and roomy enough for passport , money and cards.
customer_reviews.text: We used this money belt on a recent trip to Cusco, Peru where we heard theft could be a problem. It was comfortable, but the elastic belt was a little loose for me. I'm 5"3' 118 lbs and I adjusted it to be as tight as possible but even so it fell to my hips (and didn't stay at my waist). The two zippered pockets were great. The larger one fit our passports and had a holder for credit cards. The smaller one fit cash. We used it every day and were very happy we had it. I gave it 4 stars only because it would have been nice to be able to make the elastic belt even shorter.
customer_reviews.author: N. McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Not meant to last.
customer_reviews.text: I like how flush the pouch is against my waist. I used my pouch for a week and it’s already falling apart. I will try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shavonne

customer_reviews.title: slim design works for single traveler
customer_reviews.text: Slim and affordable, I tried this slim travel money belt along with a slightly larger travel fanny pack. As I was travelling with my family, the larger fanny pack style ended up being more functional as I was the pack mule for 4 passports, 4 transit cards, mini wifi router, cash, and more. This slim product would be ideal for a single traveler - one passport and cash to discreetly wrap on your waist under your shirt and partially under your shorts/pants. Due to the slim design, I would sometimes have to check if it was still there, good from a comfort perspective, a little worrisome from a security perspective.
customer_reviews.author: d808Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable I forgot it was there!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a recent trip to Peru and used it to store my passport, credit cards, and larger quantities of cash. I used a small money clip for incidental purchases and kept $50 or less in it. It was so comfortable I forgot I was wearing it, and it performed extremely well. I didn't do any testing as to the RFID functionality, but it did not imprint or show up under my shirt and I felt secure in high traffic and crowded areas in Cusco and Lima known for pickpocket activity. Great product and I also appreciated the $250 security insurance and happy I didn't need to claim it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, comfortable, would purchase this again
customer_reviews.text: We are frequent European travelers, and are very pleased with this top-quality money belt. It is size-adjustable and very comfortable and slim-line to lie smoothly under clothes. It has two pockets, and it has a slim but sturdy buckle you squeeze to open then to clip it back on. The seams are well-made (it feels like it will last a long time), and it has the metallic RFID blocker fabric on the inside of the pouches. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JWill

customer_reviews.title: IDP does not fit well
customer_reviews.text: Passport fits. International Driving Permit does not fit well. Have to bend it to get the IDP in there. Testing zippers to edge and especially more difficult with passport in there. Poor IDP fit also makes it more difficult to use the 3 little slots behind where the IDP would be since it will have to be moved everytime. Also once on not comfortable due to poor IDP fit. Okay with just a passport.
customer_reviews.author: ab

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I chose this brand because it was highly rated, and it didn't disappoint. I haven't actually travelled with it yet, but I tried it on. It's lightweight and soft on the back, and it seems very secure. I am particularly impressed with all of the added security features that came with the item -- stickers, registration, insurance, etc. Glad I purchased this one for my upcoming international trip.
customer_reviews.author: D. MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I took this on a one-week trip and it completely disintegrated along the zipper on day 5. The only reason I gave 2 stars, rather than 1 star is because I loved it for the first 4 days and the material used for the waist band was an incredibly soft elastic which made it quite comfortable. It could have been a great product, but the material was too thin for the stitching- and according the material ripped open.
customer_reviews.author: lp2013

customer_reviews.title: Could be bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 5 week trip to Europe and wore it just about everyday. It was comfortable, but I felt it could have been about an inch taller. I had trouble getting my passport in and out when I had money and credit cards in the other pocket. It has two zipper pockets. After my trip it did show signs of wear, but did serve its purpose. Its a nice pouch but as I said it could be a bit larger and it might be a good idea to have the zippers open in opposite directions as I kept mixing them up when I wanted to get either money or my passport out.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Very good product but...
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a very good product. It does the job, but there's one flaw in my opinion. I was using for over a week in Europe, but I was hiking a lot, and as a result I naturally produced a lot of sweat. The extra perspiration eventually soaked through the belt and got to my passport and other documents, not enough to do any significant damage, but still. I think there should be a thin waterproof layer on the inside just in case.
customer_reviews.author: GBB

customer_reviews.title: Wore this in Italy
customer_reviews.text: Due to a pickpocket problem in some Italian cities I purchased this money belt to safeguard my cash and credit cards while there. Although any money belt is inconvenient to use I felt in my case it was a necessity. Having said that, this particular money belt is probably the best way to go. It was soft, did not dig in and was not too hot to wear. It is well made and a good value for the money. Although I believe that I was never targeted by pickpockets I believe this would have made it very difficult for them to succeed.
customer_reviews.author: Fizzie

customer_reviews.title: Does stated purpose and No chafing.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as stated. Found it worked under lose top and jeans as well as a maxi dress. I would likely repurchase if I had another trip to buy an XS instead. Reason being because I had to use the adjustment to make it as tight as it could go on the regular size. Reference I’m typically size 6 at waist size of 28. Did not use to hold my cell phone as it made it stick out but that is likely because I have a bulky protector for my iphone 7+.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: It functions exactly as it's supposed to. I liked that all of my important papers and cards were kept in the same place, and nothing was stolen. I used the Return Me tags on my phone and Kindle. I wasn't a big fan of the fact that it was obvious that I had the pack underneath my shirt; it showed through as a bulge that I couldn't disguise unless I wore a jacket. Also, I didn't like that I had to pull up my shirt each time I wanted to access my cards or cash. The size of the belt was good; it fit both my mom and I.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Gifting
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice, but its a gift for someone else. So I have no first hand experience to base a review on. I chose this product as a gift after reading up on RFID chips. This product was also an "Amazon's Choice" product and I liked the price. This product also included (once you register) Theft Protection and Global Recovery Tags which I thought was a nice add on. Since I'm not the one using this product, I'm giving 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, slim profile, and comfortable fit. Not enough room for Int’l Driver’s Permit
customer_reviews.text: I recently used the travel money belt on a trip to Beijing and Xi’an, China. It's best features are the RFID protection, slim profile, and comfortable fit. It can be worn around the waist or slung over one’s shoulder. The belt and buckle are sufficiently strong and secure, though a skilled thief might defeat it with a razor blade (not a likely scenario in most places). Although the belt had sufficient space for many credit cards, money, and one passport, it was not wide enough to accommodate my international driver’s permit. Not a big deal, but it would have been convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product
customer_reviews.text: While I have yet to use it (I bought it for a trip to Mexico), it does fit the stuff it needs to, like a phone, passport as well as the usual things you would carry in a wallet. it is easy to adjust waist size and it will handle anything from a twig to a Sequoia. I think it will work just fine. A suggestion to the manufacturer. Make it a two step process to take off. It would make it much more difficult to steal
customer_reviews.author: Russell L. Henkel

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need but beware ours ripped.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel, comfortable, extends very far and will also fit a smaller waist, beige color doesn't show through clothing. However! We brought this on a two week trip to Europe and by the last few days there was a hole along one of the seams big enough for change (in this case, "change" is euros and pounds, not simply dimes and nickels) to fall out! We didn't overstuff this or abuse it in any way. For two weeks' worth of use, we were not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: kdf19

customer_reviews.title: worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: just came back from a 6 day trip and this money belt worked great. I wore it between my undershirt and the waistline of my pants ( I didn't want it on my bare skin) and it was never even noticeable, I mean to the point I had to reach in my pants and double check it was still there. Not wanting all my cash in my wallet I would take out a few bucks a day, never having to worry if I lost my wallet or if it got stolen because a majority of my cash was safe on my waist. Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: nick ny

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good buy but not if you sweat.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this belt for an upcoming trip. It is light-weight and clips on easily under the shirt or belt/pants. Beyond that, I'll update later after my trip. Update: This is a nice idea but they need to work on water proofing this. I am the type of person that sweats a lot. I went to the South of France mid-July. After an afternoon beach walk my passport, cash and everything else made of paper was entirely mushy. I gave it three stars because it holds your belongs securely pretty well in cooler climates.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Z

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love this but the first day I wore it walking ...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this but the first day I wore it walking in London our passports etc were soaked. This product needs a waterproof lining to protect the contents from body perspiration. Otherwise a great idea, comfortable, easy to use as long as you are in air conditioning and don't engage in any physical activity.
customer_reviews.author: R&M Ho

customer_reviews.title: Really good, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is easy and comfortable to use. It had plenty of storage for our passports, some cash, and a credit card. It fit under my shirt on my waist or my chest. Easy day to save valuables. Unfortunately, the side that contacts the skin allowed me to sweat through and get the items wet. Don’t use this if you’re doing something that causes you to sweat for a longer period of time or if you do something like a walking tour.
customer_reviews.author: Benny W Late

customer_reviews.title: Not even noticeable
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time traveling out of the country and I thought to be cautious to have my personal belongings (wallet and passport) on me and safe. I was able to fit my wallet, passport, money, portable charger, and receipts all in this wallet without it appearing as a bulge under my shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Sirlyle

customer_reviews.title: I liked this money belt
customer_reviews.text: I liked this money belt. I wore it for a week trip in a Scandinavian country in the fall. I didn't sweat with it on, but I was in a cold weather situation so I will have to test it out in a warmer/normal weather situation. The material and zippers feel like good quality. My only concerns were with the pockets for storing cards (on the inside of the zipper pockets). They felt loose when I put my cards in the pockets and I had to be very aware when I took my passport out that I did not accidentally knock my cards out as well.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: I've now had a chance to use mine, in Cancun Mx and it worked great! I like how thin it is, and functional. Mesh is comfortable against my body. My only minor complaint is that the snap mechanism is "delicate" and I fear it will break under normal use at some point. I've seen others post that it broke on them and I see why, the "grabbing fingers" are small and curved in such a way that could easily catch or be stressed. Not looking forward to that, but I will replace it when it does. For now, it's a great value and got much use on my travels.
customer_reviews.author: M. O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: A little small for passport with cover
customer_reviews.text: The zipper part is a bit smaller than expected. Hard to fit a passport with cover. However, it did work well. I brought this and another shoulder bag to Europe. Split my cards and money between the two. Worked great. I got my cash out in bathrooms so I wasn’t digging under my shirt all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindlereader

customer_reviews.title: It’s not just a money belt!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it. What sets it apart is the way they do business and go the extra mile to give you all the advantages of using a money belt. The registration against theft, the “return me” feature are not found or offered (that I could see) on any other money belt products. It fits great, lies flat, even with passport and a small key & credit card & the strap doesn’t bind. Why would you buy any other brand?
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The money belt arrived quickly and as described. I've used it and and found it to be very comfortable. When wearing somewhat loose/comfortable clothing, you can't even tell that you have it on! I love that I don't have to worry about having a pocketbook hanging off my shoulder or a strap across my body. This may replace my pocketbook altogether! It allows me to carry the essentials without all the other "stuff" I end up carrying in a pocketbook and end up rarely using. I love that it also has a built in RFID block, although as another user said, I can't really check for that. The cost is very reasonable, too!
customer_reviews.author: Janie Mae

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for Today’s Travelers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and well made. I bought two of these to use for an upcoming trip to NYC. The elderly relative I am traveling with prefers to carry cash for expenses. I also plan to take an international trip early next year. The belt is very comfortable and is spacious enough to fit cash, a passport, and credit cards. Having it have RFID blocking is such a plus. Even sophisticated travelers fall victim to pick pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Love/ Don Not LoveThis

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I used this belt on a trip to New York City and it worked well. My shirt remained smooth and you could not see the belt underneath. The buckle held fast. The pockets were big enough to hold not only loose cash, but the envelopes that I had segregated the cash for different purchases. It felt a little awkward taking money out from under my shirt, but that would be the case with any hidden belt, so not a complaint. I was happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Worked as it should
customer_reviews.text: This belt worked as it should, held two passports and money without issues and is not bulky at all. Only thing is that I had to put the stuff in a ziplock because my body heat (not sweat; it was relatively cool/chilly during my trip) ended up creating enough condensation that transferred through the back of the pouch to the passports (had to put them under a weight to straighten their warped covers). The buckle is very flat and unnnoticeable. Zippers open and closed easily. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kwisatz Haderack

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, comfortable, and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an upcoming trip overseas. Great for keeping passport, drivers license, credit cards, and cash safe. Plenty of room for everything mentioned. Had the opportunity to give it a "test drive" while snowmobiling at Yellowstone last week. Lots of room for cash, credit cards, and license. I also put car keys in to avoid losing them. Even with keys it was extremely comfortable. Wore it under shirt and slightly tucked into pants. It was so comfortable that I actually forgot that I was wearing it. Great purchase! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great travel belt
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this on a recent trip to Europe. The belt is very lightweight and did not cause any chafing around his waist. It is so slim that it was not noticeable under his shirt. I highly recommend this belt for traveling and for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe lover

customer_reviews.title: Good quality belt, get the X-small for waists smaller than 28 inches
customer_reviews.text: Belt is comfortable and appears to be made of a breathable fabric. Two zipper compartments easily fit passport, credit cards (individual slots for them) and money. I haven't yet given it a good test run, but wanted to review it now as I discovered that 1. the regular size is a little big if you have a 27 inch waist, you want the X-small and 2. This company has great customer service. I'd gotten several emails asking if I was totally happy with the product. Responded to one asking if there was any way to tighten it and they responded quickly with an offer to send me the x-small, which came the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best money belt I've seen
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made. The side that is on your body is soft and comfortable. The strap is flat so it does not bulge under shirt creating a nice smooth appearance from the outside. It is large enough to hold my passport, CC's, money, phone and lipstick so I don't even need a purse. Which is great so I concentrate on taking pictures with our new camera. The color is exact to the photos. The material is light weight. You cant go wrong with this belt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: credit cards and cash organized and easily accessible at a moment’s notice
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the Peak Gear Money Belt is made from water-resistant nylon. The money belt has two premium YKK zippers that is designed to last. The money belt has two pockets, one of which features special compartments to keep your passports, credit cards and cash organized and easily accessible at a moment’s notice. The RFID Block protection is built into the belt’s fabric, so that everything inside is protected. The strap includes a double release safety buckle and can be easily adjusted. Although the buckle may be rather flimsy, I think this is still a great product and works very well for any traveler. Great job and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Lee

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good idea but in practice, difiicult to get $ out from under your shirt.
customer_reviews.author: rocks

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about the RFID blocking but I have this and RFID sleeves and nothing has been stolen that I know of. This is super thin and not noticeable. It fits my passport (tight fit) and multiple cards and cash. I personally have the straps on my stomach so is not as noticeable but still about as thin as you get. Super easy to adjust as well. I have used for 2 months abroad and recommended to family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Austin Manor

customer_reviews.title: Secure, great buckle, could be tiny big bigger for IDL
customer_reviews.text: Despite some reviews that said it was too small to hold documentation, I purchased it because I like the buckle. I didn't want it breaking and others I had seen had a cheap looking latch/buckle. This one was better, like I expected, and you don't have excess strap hanging down after you adjust it. Now, it needs to be a tiny bit bigger to be 5 stars, but passports just fit in the larger compartment. An int'l DL had to be bent just slightly. But, if you don't mind that or use only public transportation you will be happy with this belt. I also love that it comes in 2 sizes - a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Pocket devider shreds apart
customer_reviews.text: Loved this on day 1. However on Day 2 of our Cruise I was in and out of it several times and the divider between the two pockets shredded from the zipper. This made it increasingly difficult to get to the items in the back pocket. I ordered this well in advance of the cruise and it is now too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer  Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Quality money belt from a conscientious company
customer_reviews.text: Well designed product for traveling that is made with excellent quality, e.g., good quality zippers, quality stitching, belt buckle that is not likely to break under normal wear, etc. Very happy with this money belt, as it meets all my projected needs for function and for quality construction to be used on my coming 2-month trip. Also excellent follow-up by the company, including alerting me of shipment, projected arrival, and making sure I knew how to contact them if I had any questions. Thrilled with my purchase..
customer_reviews.author: VaHiker

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Is AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable, and no one can tell you're wearing it. Customer service is the best! I will consider purchasing more items from this company because of their customer service. Very good communication. Taking care of the customer is their number one priority. Most people say that, this one backs it up. I would give them more stars if i could. Hard to find companies like this now days. Kudos!
customer_reviews.author: shane yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and secure
customer_reviews.text: Husband used this on a 15 day European trip. It fit nicely under clothing and didn't show and he had his hands free with no worry about someone taking his wallet. Pickpocket warnings abound in the large cities. Cash, credit card, ID all fit nicely. You are looking at the sights and not paying attention to your surroundings very much. This was quite secure.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: This wallet worked as expected. I am 6ft tall and 215lbs. I am not giant but I am far from small. This made it difficult to get to the zippers to open and close the wallet when needed. I kept having to pull my shirt up to fully expose where my money or cards were. Other than that the wallet was easy to adjust and once on, provided I didnt nees to get anything, it was comfortable to wear all day. I would like to see one with zippers that are vertical instead of horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight, Easy To Conceal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to NYC. This belt was very comfortable, not noticeable at all comfort wise while wearing, or noticeable under clothing. I was wearing thin cotton/spandex material, pull over shirts. Does not protect your money from hot days and the resulting sweat! It would be nice were it to be a better barrier from moisture, but everything became VERY damp in the belt. Still, for fit and discretion, I think it was a perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow to use effectively. Disappointed-- should have returned it immediately after my trip. The only thing I was able to use it for -- carrier for my glasses. Waistband strap poor quality--stretched out of shape.
customer_reviews.author: JMP in CA

customer_reviews.title: Great Security
customer_reviews.text: I really like this belt. My wife and I went to Europe for our 25th Wedding Anniversary, and I was worried about security. I've heard that people are buying this type of money belt because bad new things are happening, so I wanted to get them for us. After a bit of research, I decided to buy these. I'm very happy I did. They are well built, comfortable and sturdy. It gave us peace of mind. We had our credit cards, passports and some money in there. Ha! I even put other non-important things in there just to keep them handy!
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Segarra

customer_reviews.title: PEAK - Excellent money belt & company!
customer_reviews.text: This money belt is very well made & top quality. I had ordered Amazon's brand belt and returned it. The clip on this belt is much better because you have to press each side to release it. The fabric & elastic belt is soft. It is also seen extremely well & stitching is secure, & as stated in the description, they use YKK zippers. The seller & manufacturer care about their customer's satisfaction. I received 2 emails from them making sure I was satisfied and happy with my purchase. I highly recommend PEAK products and would order from them again. Thanks, PEAK!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Secure and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: My husband took this with him on a trip to Nepal where he was required at the last minute to take a lot of cash with him and be responsible for handling the expenses for a team of 6 people traveling to various places and remote villages along with his own cash and credit card and ID. The money belt held up well after being worn for 13 days straight and he'll use it again on other international trips that require the security of his carrying credit cards and cash.
customer_reviews.author: Seahawks Lvr

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging and theft protection an added bonus
customer_reviews.text: Received the Peak money belt quickly and the product looked very nice. The attention to detail in the packaging gave me confidence in the quality of the product. Haven't used the Peak money belt on a trip but it feels comfortable. Hope I don't need to use the theft protection but the ReturnMe stickers were an unexpected bonus. Will submit a review update after returning from our trip.
customer_reviews.author: John Wright

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I've seen
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the one I need for several approaching international trips. Very light weight and comfortable to wear. My passport(in a cover) just fits with lots of room for cash, cards and other necessities you want to take on a jaunt around a strange city. I am traveling to Europe where pick pockets are rampant and so clever that they can steal from your bag - or cut the strap so quickly you will not realize it until it's too late.. If this belt is worn under clothing no one will ever know you have it on much less be able to steal from it without your knowledge
customer_reviews.author: charbar

customer_reviews.title: Great for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my trip to Africa. Signing up for the security features for my trip was quick and easy. I wore this for two entire days while traveling on the plane. It was completely comfortable, and I never noticed I had it on. It did not show any bulge, so was inconspicuous to others. I had no sweat issues. I had no issues going through security scanners, except when re-entering the United States from out of the country. I did not encounter any rain, so cannot attest to it being water proof. I would highly recommend this for travelers who want to keep money or important documents with them but out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martin

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: Well made! Can't objectively confirm RFID blocking, but no reason to doubt. Very nice finish-out on the strap, with no dangling end. Clever 2-buckle system secures the slack for infinite waist size adjustment. Excellent primary buckle requires thumb and forefinger to open, virtually eliminating any chance of accidental unbuckling. Zippers are as advertised, top quality YKK. This is a vastly better pouch than REI's branded product, which suffers from a cheap buckle that easily pops open from surface pressure, as might happen when bending or stooping.
customer_reviews.author: DIYguy

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: Carried cash on vacation. I wear 5 gold bracelets that always sets off the metal detector . ( This would not set off a metal detector, all plastic clasps and material. ) So, got a pat down and the woman TSA felt it. She looked at me and I said " my money." She did not take a look . Just said ok .
customer_reviews.author: Jane Markoski

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this money belt for a week in Europe, and it worked great. It had a nice, snug fit, and it got to the point that I didn't even notice I was wearing it anymore. I carried Euros, credit cards, and my passport in it, and there was plenty of room. The only thing that I'd note is that after a long, hot day, my money was a little sweaty! I tried to let it dry before I gave the bills to anyone, but we had a good laugh about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed expectations
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I wasn't sure if I'd even need this and assumed I'd stop using it after a day or two but it surpassed my expectations as it relates to comfort. Used it during a recent trip to Spain and unless I used the restroom, I forgot I was wearing it. Light and comfortable, it easily fit multiple passports, drivers' licenses, credit cards and cash without much of a bulge. Must have for travellers!
customer_reviews.author: DrJ

customer_reviews.title: It held up pretty good. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a trip to Europe (3 countries). It held up pretty good. Good quality. The things I did not like is that you cannot put more than couple of passports as it would be too bulky and show up under the shirt. Also, in a hot climate you will perspirate quite a bit under this belt. Not a big deal since you qould sweat anyway. All in all, it is a good belt. Just make sure you are aware that it might not have been designed to hold too much stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzkin

customer_reviews.title: Travel Belt for Overseas Vacation
customer_reviews.text: What made me buy this product were the reviews from prior customers. When purchasing items I look at both good and not so good reviews. After reading the reviews people seemed pretty happy with thier purchase. I have to say I am one of those happy people. The description was spot on. I will use this product for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Qura

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a slim waist, so this is a bit large, even on the smallest adjustment. I wish they'd make a smaller strap for petitte and kids.. other than that, it is all it is described. I have been using it daily for my id and any cards that I bring. With times as they are, I only keeep my keys, music device and other things in my bag or backpack. I registered my id and passport online with the two included stickers.
customer_reviews.author: pen💮

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery - no surprises
customer_reviews.text: The Travel Money Belt with RFID Block - Theft Protection and Global Recovery Tags arrived quickly, it fits me well and is comfortable. My passport fits in it snugly. It will be six weeks before I actually use it on a trip but I anticipate no problems. I activated one of the Global recovery tags and applied it to the back of my phone - that was a quick and simple procedure. Great experience so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Smith, Texarkana, Ar

customer_reviews.title: Great product that fits and holds as it should!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited to use this on my trip to Europe this fall! I was looking for a product that could safely hide and protect my valuables while I am traveling around and this is the perfect fit! (Literally) I am a size 10-12 women waist and the regular fits perfect and can be adjusted to be bigger or smaller. I will update my review after my travels but overall so far this product seems amazing! I have already worn it for working out when I walk/run outside to hold my phone and it works fantastic for that as well!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: feel safe while traveling in Italy
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended by Rick Steve in one of his seminars. I bought two, one for my self and one for my husband. We used these belts everyday while visiting Venice, Florence and Rome. They kept the passports, credit cards and cash in a safe place, and allowed us to focus enjoying the trip, but the nuisance of theft. . They are also soft and flat, not irritating to the waist. We highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my recent trip to Paris where pickpockets are a problem. There's two zippered compartments. The larger one easily holds a US passport. US currency fits nicely into the smaller one. The elastic belt worked well holding it to my body. I wore it under a shirt with the compartment in the small of my back, and it really didn't bother me having it on. Nice material. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Darden

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, “soft & comfortable” and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this belt because it looked like it would be comfortable and the zipper tags were made of cloth! It is soft and comfortable! I can zip it open without showing a lot, zipper is right at the top! Fits well just as it came! Can be adjusted though another half the length and it’s already big enough! Can also be made that much smaller if needed! If you have a belly it can be worn under or on top under the chest either way works. Very well made, stitching is strong and made to last! Great belt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slim money belt
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in time. Ordered one for all of us. We are off on a safari so want to keep Important things safe. Nice and slim so will not look bulky under clothes. Like the idea that credit cards are protected in case people try and take the information from you whilst walking close by. Have not used it yet but I think it will tick all the boxes. Looks good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda O'reilly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 year old daughter to use on a trip to Paris and London. She is not use to wearing belts or carrying a handbag and she wasn't pleased with this option as she was getting ready to travel. She quickly adapted and LOVED the ease of use and the added security. I bought another one for my 80 year old father to wear when he rides his bike so he can put his cell phone in it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves it purpose well!
customer_reviews.text: Very very useful!! Soft texture so was comfortable to wear. I wore it for over 10 hours a day on my recent trip. Great comfort and useful! Can fit your passport and some money but not much else. I wore it under my shirt but you could tell it was there. I noticed it in the photos. But I also had tight clothing on most times. If you wear loose clothing maybe it wont show as much.
customer_reviews.author: Ardie

customer_reviews.title: Travel Money Belt with RFID Block
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Travel Money Belt with RFID Block which was delivered right away. Reason for the purchase was for the RFID. We have the other kind but wanted to update to the RFID. Looks good. Since we are all in quarantine it will be awhile before we will get to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: A Comfortable way to keep your cash and documents safe
customer_reviews.text: We recently returned from an extended trip to London, Paris and Scotland. We spent a lot of time on mass transit via the tube, Uber and the very efficient bus routes. The "money belt" was so comfortable that I often forgot that I was wearing it! Plenty of crowded conditions but at the end of our excursion we installed our granddaughter in her dorm in University of Edinburgh and came home with no threat of having our pockets picked. I highly recommend this device for solid peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised..
customer_reviews.text: Too much of what amazon offers is shrouded in hyperbole. Not this product. It is just as advertised, in fact maybe better. It has more than enough room for the essentials.Used it daily for three weeks. It was comfortable to wear, didn't make you perspire and really was virtually undetectable. The manufacturer's claims were very accurate. Big fan of the product. I am a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Zdzislaw Nagengast

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use it going through airport scanner
customer_reviews.text: Generally, this is well made. However, the RFID thing is always picked up by the airport scanner. This makes people running the scanner suspicious, and then I have to take it off, and they want to look through it. I am going to replace this with a non-RFID one. The idea that a thief will somehow scan your credit card as you are walking down the street is a little far-fetched in any case.
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary citizen

customer_reviews.title: Kept my belongings safe
customer_reviews.text: Used this when I traveled to Rome and Naples (May 2018). It definitely served it's purpose and was effective in keeping my money and cards safe. My only complaint was that it didn't logistically work with some of the outfits that I wore on my trip (i.e. rompers/jumpsuit). So I will probably just get the one you wear around your neck next time to work seamlessly with any outfit I pack.
customer_reviews.author: Steph M.

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go
customer_reviews.text: The belt is light, ruggedly made and easy to wear. I believe it will serve me and my wife well on our cruise. Ok, I am back from the cruise and the money belt performed very well. Kept me and my valuables very safe. Thanks, but no more review requests please!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Ludington

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt - If only there was room for an International License . . .
customer_reviews.text: First of all - I believe this is the best one on the market today. Much more comfortable material then others we have tried and the waist band is great. I merely gave 4 stars because I would like one of the pockets to fit an International Driver's License. My husband typically wears the belt with his money, tickets, passport and International License. If you could make that modification, or sell another with one of the pockets that dimension that would be fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Irysh

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use this yet, but it appears to be well made and suited for its purpose ( carrying bills safely). Was a little disappointed in the larger part of the interior having only one partition for bills with several smaller ones for change, I guess. What would be better and more useful, would be four full length compartments for ones, fives, tens, and twenties. However, other than this, I think it will still do the job it was made for quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Nice breathability and plenty of room for important documents
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for my trip to Italy. Totally un-noticeable under clothes. Generous adjustability. Nice breathability and plenty of room for important documents. Wouldn't recommend for passport since passports are usually larger in width than this belt. But, it's perfect for paper money, coins, receipts and any other small private items. LOVE the RFID blocking and the warranty protection. Good purchase. It will last a long time for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Money Belt for traveling abroad!
customer_reviews.text: We just returned from a trip to Spain. I bought this money belt specifically for this trip and future trips out of the country. I cannot say enough about the quality and great fit of this money belt. I love the fact there are 2 zipper compartments to separate passports from other things such as money and credit cards. Plenty of room and strap was adjustable and comfortable. I would highly recommend this product and seller was great too.
customer_reviews.author: athea

customer_reviews.title: Very practical money belt with zippered pockets, and RFID.
customer_reviews.text: The money belt portion was very well sized and seemed very practical with zippered pockets. The stretch belt seemed too stretchy and seemed not to be of much strength to me. Wished it had sturdier belt, so I returned. Maybe I received a defective belt.
customer_reviews.author: amazonpal

customer_reviews.title: I tweaked the strap on this bad boy a bit and am going to carry it ...
customer_reviews.text: I tweaked the strap on this bad boy a bit and am going to carry it diagonally across my chest tightly with some fishing line attached to my cell phone and one of my belt loops and another one to the Money Belt and a belt loop and just hope some street moron in Colombia tries to snag something from me as he's going to have several surprises coming to him directly thereafter! It really looks like it will do the job properly and covertly as it is extremely light and thin and will only be carrying a color copy of the inside of my passport, enough money for the day one credit card and that's about it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Stack

customer_reviews.title: Money Belt - Not fanny pack.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Going to Europe in a few weeks and this belt (not a fanny pack) is perfect for carrying flat, non-bulky things like passport, credit cards, cash, hotel room keys, train tickets/passes; just about anything and everything, with RFID protection. Probably able to fit flat clip-on sunglasses, but not folding sunglasses very well. Well made. Great quality. Light weight. Excellent price. Can be worn under a shirt without obvious lump.
customer_reviews.author: Golfing Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Safety first....a must have
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing to have. As we traveled to the market in South America we were warned of the pick pocketing problem. I was told to keep my purse at hotel or in the safe. Well how would I transport my funds and documents passport etc. Having this Money Belt was a life saver. From the outside we had nothing. I will suggest this item to all those traveling abroad best thing to have.
customer_reviews.author: Best Deals Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I use this item for travel and it is a replacement for an old belt that I had worn out. Decided to get black instead of the tan and I really like the color, size, and feel of the fabric. I also like that it has RFID protection. My old belt did not have that protection. It also has pockets inside for individual credit cards and similar-sized cards. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: mlh2006

customer_reviews.title: Excellent money belt
customer_reviews.text: I used this money belt on a 10 day trip to Indonesia and can't give it enough praise. I kept all my essentials like passport, credit cards, US and Indonesian money, boarding passes, etc. I wore it under my shirt the entire 10 days I was there and absolutely loved having it. Sometimes I would wear it high enough that it was above my belt line and touching my skin and with the soft backing it was always comfortable. Most of the time I wore it just below my belt line and again it was very comfortable. It is easy to adjust and is made well enough that it will last a long time. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Charley Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, secure and hidden.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet. Bought for coming up trip. It is very comfortable though and will hold money, credit cards and passport without a problem. Fits around upper stomach under clothing. Also will work around waist on top of clothing. So after trip will be able to use for walking, running or even around town. Bought a second for husband because he liked it also. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Money Belt
customer_reviews.text: I don't plan to use the money belt until next year but I did try it on and packed it with credit cards, 2 passports and my iPhone 6. I was surprised at how flat it stayed with all the stuff I filled it with and it was very comfortable. I also liked that it was virtually unnoticeable under my shirt. The waist band is easily to adjust and the entire belt seems to be well made. The only negative is you have to lift your shirt up to gain access but that's better then losing your wallet to a pick pocket.
customer_reviews.author: LVBob

product_meta.title: Travel Money Belt with RFID Block - Theft Protection and Global Recovery Tags (Beige REG)
feature_bullets: ULTIMATE COMFORT – Light, comfortable and slim this belt is the perfect travel accessory whether you are an occasional airport traveler or an avid backpacker. Peak Gear’s unique Comfort Soft strap adjusts snug around the waist to fit both men and women. Two compartments and pockets inside the hidden pouch fit multiple US passports and keeps credit cards organized. Our moisture-wick backing will keep the pouch cool against your skin, especially useful for all day use or in warm climates.

INVEST IN QUALITY – Don’t buy a cheap money belt and risk getting stuck while travelling. Peak Gear offers Premium YKK Zippers (the highest quality on the market), 210D water-resistant nylon, premium stitching and a double-release safety buckle. We did not skimp on materials so you’ll never have to worry about reliability.

INCLUDES THEFT INSURANCE AND LIFETIME RECOVERY SERVICE FOR LOST ITEMS **ONLY valid when purchasing from “PEAK GEAR” and not from others claiming to sell PEAK products** $250 Theft Insurance to reimburse you if items are stolen. We’ve also partnered with ReturnMe, the world’s largest lost & found company, to give you 2 FREE Global Recovery Decals ($8 value). Stick on your phone, passport, camera, etc. and their 24/7 call center will help return lost items from anywhere in the world.

NO SEPARATE RFID SLEEVES NEEDED – Protect yourself from electronic pickpockets. Peak Gear’s RFID Block Protection is built right into the fabric of the money belt. Anything you put in the belt will be protected against electronic theft. RFID sleeves look fancy but are a pain to fuss with.

100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE – Our USA-based customer service team will make sure you are happy with your purchase. PEAK products are designed and tested by avid US travelers who understand the need for the best quality and dependability. The only thing we don’t guarantee is this special pricing – Buy your money belt today and don’t be disappointed.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,636 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
